content: edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 379 introduce cc green 3 & cc pink 3 as needed the rose is knitted entirely from the chart with no repeat cut cc pink 3 leaving a tail to sew in later stitch count 3 + 20+ 3 = 26 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 23 hedgehog row 346 - 362 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 362 cut mc white and introduce cc cream 1 cc brown 1 & cc orange 1 as needed the hedgehog is knitted entirely from the chart with no repeat cut cc cream 1 cc brown 1 & cc orange 1 leaving tails to sew in later rejoin mc white stitch count 3 + 28+ 3 = 34 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 22 raspberries row 328 - 345 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 345 introducing cc green 1 & cc deep pink as needed the raspberry motif is 3 stitches wide and is repeated 2 times across the width of the scarf with the 3rd berry on the left decrease side being knit from the chart place stitch markers every 13 sts as appropriate cut cc green 1 & cc deep pink leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 37+ 3 = 43 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 21 hollyhock row 304 - 327 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 327 introducing cc green 3 & cc pink 1 as needed the hollyhock motif is 8 stitches wide and is repeated 5 times across the width of the scarf with the 6th stem on the left decrease side being knit from the chart place stitch markers every 8 sts as appropriate cut cc green 3 & cc pink 1 leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 46+ 3 = 52 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 20 common blue butterfly row 290 - 303 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 303 introducing cc purple blue & cc almost black as needed the butterfly motif is 19 stitches wide and is repeated 3 times across the width of the scarf place stitch markers every 19 sts as appropriate cut cc purple blue & cc almost black leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 58+ 3 = 64 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the
